title: Kotuku Elixir Bar and Superfood Store
description: A drinks bar at the front of Divini Tree Yoga Studio which is housed in one of Santa Barbara's oldest buildings. Since Jun 2013. Offers smoothies, bottled cold pressed juices, and elixirs using superfoods and tonic herbs. Its grab n go case offers salads, bento boxes, raw desserts. Sells tonic herbs and a few superfood items. Small space, mostly grab n go.
